nodes.text: The Interrogation Chamber was a location within Fortress Inquisitorius on the ocean moon of Nur in the Mustafar system. It was used by the Inquisitorius to interrogate and torture Jedi in order to turn them into Inquisitors, and had an interrogation chair in the center of the room.

In 14 BBY, during his mission to restore the Jedi Order, Jedi Knight Cal Kestis infiltrated the fortress in order to recover a holocron that was stolen by the Inquisitor Second Sister on the planet Bogano after a brief duel with one another. However, Kestis was tasked with reaching the Interrogation Chamber, where the holocron was being kept, but instead faced the Inquisitor in a duel once more, which resulted in her death at the hands of the Sith Lord Darth Vader, who tore the room apart while trying to kill Kestis.
The Interrogation Chamber appeared in the 2019 video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, developed by Respawn Entertainment and released by Electronic Arts.
